name: Postal Pandemonium
description:
RoboPost is expecting a high volumes of packages! Your job is to separate packages by color as fast as possible to prevent the mailroom from being overloaded! Place packages in their respective bins by walking up to them or throwing them in! The longer you take the faster the mailroom meter will fill. Aim to have as many packages delivered as possible! FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED -- IF UI doesn't look normal then try in minimized mode!

Controls:

Movement: "WASD" 

Respawn / Throw Package: "J" / "K"
